snippet: Washington must use all of its influence with China to ensure the safety of this courageous activist.
abstract: Editorial urges the United States to use all of its influence with China to ensure the safety of Chen Guangcheng, a blind Chinese human rights activist who has escaped from house arrest and sought refuge with the Americans.
lead_paragraph: Washington must use all of its influence with China to ensure the safety of this courageous activist.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
